## Description {#details}

A single rule in a legalizer info ruleset.

The specified action is chosen when the predicate is true. Where appropriate for the action (e.g. for WidenScalar) the new type is selected using the given mutator.

Definition at line 407 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizerinfo-h">LegalizerInfo.h</a>.
